name: goody + flexi - emotive dissonance - fused emotion chip5
description: goody + flexi - emotive dissonance - fused emotion chip5

shapecode_1_g=0.000

shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1

shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=q4=1.5+.2*sin(time*.33)+.2*cos(time*.33);
per_frame_2=q5=1.5+.2*cos(time*.51)+.2*sin(time*.21);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=//zoom
per_frame_5=q6=1+.5*sin(time*.77)+.25*cos(time*.33);
per_frame_6=//movement
per_frame_7=q7=.025*cos(time*.346)+.025*sin(time*.662-q4);
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=q31=(time*1.1)+.25*cos(time*1.64);
per_frame_10=q32=(time*1.12)+.25*cos(time*1.19);
per_frame_11=// a
per_frame_12=q21 = 1*cos(-time*0.2); // the real part
per_frame_13=q22 = 1*sin(-time*0.2); // the imaginary part
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=// b
per_frame_16=q23 = 0; // the real part
per_frame_17=q24 = 0.3; // the imaginary part
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=// c
per_frame_20=q25 = 0.333*cos(time*0.2); // the real part
per_frame_21=q26 = 0.333*sin(time*0.2); // the imaginary part
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=// d
per_frame_24=q27 = 0.8; // the real part
per_frame_25=q28 = 00; // the imaginary part
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=q11 = 1/asin(1);
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=bassfix=.05+.01*bass;
per_frame_30=midfix=.05+.01*mid;
per_frame_31=trebfix=.05+.01*treb;
per_frame_32=bassif=if(above(bass_att,1),bassif+bassfix,if(above(bassif,85),0,bassif*.96));
per_frame_33=midif=if(above(mid_att,1),midif+midfix,if(above(midif,.85),0,midif*.96));
per_frame_34=trebif=if(above(treb_att,1),trebif+trebfix,if(above(trebif,.85),0,trebif*.96));
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=q12=bassif;
per_frame_37=q13=midif;
per_frame_38=q14=trebif;
per_frame_39=q15=abs(cos(bassif-time));
per_frame_40=q16=abs(cos(midif-time));
per_frame_41=q17=abs(cos(trebif-time));
per_pixel_1=zoom=1.0+.05*sin(ang*9-10*sin(time)-rad*10*cos(time)-time);
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_4=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_5=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=dx=dx_r+.005*sin(time*1.463);
per_pixel_8=dy=dy_r+.005*sin(time*1.222);
warp_1=`
warp_2=`shader_body
warp_3=`{
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    float2 stretch = float2(roam_cos.x, roam_sin.x)*1;
warp_7=`    float2 move = float2(roam_sin.x*1.2, roam_cos.x*1.2);
warp_8=`    float tex = tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv * stretch-move);
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    ret = lerp(ret, 2*tex, 0.1);    
warp_11=`
warp_12=`    ret *= float3(.912+.01*q12,.912+.01*q14,.912+.01*q13);
warp_13=`
warp_14=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`float2 factorA, factorB, product;
comp_3=`float2 numerator, denominator, fraction;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`shader_body
comp_6=`{
comp_7=`
comp_8=`float2 uvo = uv;
comp_9=`
comp_10=`//Roaming Zoom effect;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`//first create a value which moves uv, doesn't need to be too precise
comp_13=`half2 zoom_mod=uv-q7;
comp_14=`
comp_15=`//then one to multiply by!
comp_16=`half1 zoom=(q6);
comp_17=`zoom_mod*=zoom.xx;
comp_18=`
comp_19=`uv=zoom_mod;
comp_20=`
comp_21=`//*** Flexis Moebius transformation code
comp_22=`
comp_23=`uv = (uv-0.5)*aspect.xy*2;
comp_24=`factorA = uv;
comp_25=`factorB = float2(q21,q22);
comp_26=`product = float2( factorA.x*factorB.x - factorA.y*factorB.y,   // the products real part
comp_27=`                  factorA.x*factorB.y + factorA.y*factorB.x);  // the products imaginary part
comp_28=`
comp_29=`numerator = product + float2(q23,q24);
comp_30=`
comp_31=`factorA = uv;
comp_32=`factorB = float2(q25,q26);
comp_33=`product = float2( factorA.x*factorB.x - factorA.y*factorB.y,   // the products real part
comp_34=`                  factorA.x*factorB.y + factorA.y*factorB.x);  // the products imaginary part
comp_35=`
comp_36=`
comp_37=`denominator = product + float2(q27,q28);
comp_38=`
comp_39=`fraction = float2( numerator.x*denominator.x + numerator.y*denominator.y,   // the fractions real part
comp_40=`                   numerator.y*denominator.x - numerator.x*denominator.y)/  // the fractions imaginary part
comp_41=`                   (denominator.x*denominator.x + denominator.y*denominator.y);
comp_42=`
comp_43=`uv = fraction*1;
comp_44=`
comp_45=`// ***
comp_46=`
comp_47=`// *** Flexis logarithmic spiral code
comp_48=`
comp_49=`float t = 1.5*time; // set velocity here
comp_50=`float2 c = (uv-0.5)*aspect.wz;
comp_51=`float1 ang_hq = atan2(c.x,c.y);
comp_52=`// q11 = 1/asin(1); from the init section
comp_53=`float2 spiral = float2(ang_hq*q11*7+t,aspect.w*log(length(c))+ang_hq*q11-t);
comp_54=`spiral = 0.5 + (0.5 - abs( frac( spiral * 0.5 ) * 2.0 - 1 ))*0.5; // mirror
comp_55=`uv = spiral.yx;
comp_56=`
comp_57=`// ***
comp_58=`
comp_59=`float2 uvt = (abs(uv.x)+abs(uv.y));
comp_60=`
comp_61=`//You can change the speed and direction of rotation by changing this variable
comp_62=`float rot=1+(.06*length(uvt)*.05*length(uv));
comp_63=`
comp_64=`//This variable defines the center of rotation (cx, cy)
comp_65=`float2 cxy=float2(.5,.5);
comp_66=`
comp_67=`float2 xymod=uv-cxy;
comp_68=`float2 xy1=0;
comp_69=`
comp_70=`//Rotate xy plane
comp_71=`xy1.x=sin(time*rot)*xymod.x-cos(time*rot)*xymod.y;
comp_72=`xy1.y=cos(time*rot)*xymod.x+sin(time*rot)*xymod.y;
comp_73=`
comp_74=`float2 rt=(xy1);
comp_75=`float2 rmod=rt-.5;
comp_76=`
comp_77=`uv=rmod;
comp_78=`
comp_79=`float2 uvm=0;
comp_80=`
comp_81=`uvm.x=uv.x-.07*tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uvt.x*.8).x;
comp_82=`uvm.y=uv.y-.07*tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uvt.y*.8).x;
comp_83=`
comp_84=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(uvm);
comp_85=`float3 sharp = tex2D(sampler_main, uvm);
comp_86=`float3 fix = GetPixel(frac(uvm));
comp_87=`
comp_88=`float2 mod = 4*float2(1*(fix.x)+cos(uvm.x-roam_sin.y*2-2*q31), 1*(fix.x)-sin(uvm.y+roam_cos.x*2-2*q32));
comp_89=`
comp_90=`float3 fret = (10*fix-blur*rad)-mod.xxx;
comp_91=`float3 inv = 1-fret;
comp_92=`
comp_93=`float melt = dot(fret, inv);
comp_94=`
comp_95=`ret=tex2D(sampler_main, uv.xy)*inv+.55*fret;
comp_96=`float3 modret=lerp(ret, inv, 1.5*saturate(melt));
comp_97=`
comp_98=`float3 blur1 = GetBlur1(uvm);
comp_99=`float3 sharp1 = tex2D(sampler_main, uvm);
comp_100=`//float3 fix1 = GetPixel(frac(uvm));
comp_101=`
comp_102=`float2 mod1 = 4*float2(1*(fix.z)+cos(uvm.x-roam_sin.y*2-2*q31), 1*(fix.z)-sin(uvm.y+roam_cos.x*2-2*q32));
comp_103=`
comp_104=`float3 fret1 = (10*fix-blur1*rad)-mod1.xxx;
comp_105=`float3 inv1 = 1-fret1;
comp_106=`
comp_107=`float melt1 = dot(fret1, inv1);
comp_108=`
comp_109=`ret=tex2D(sampler_main, uv)+inv1+.5*fret1;
comp_110=`float3 modret1=lerp(ret, inv1, 1.5*saturate(melt1));
comp_111=`
comp_112=`ret=lerp(saturate(modret*modret*.5), modret*modret1, .5);
comp_113=`}
